languages.text: "Корабль разделился. Те, кто предан истинному Лорд-капитану, бьются с теми, кто поверил в слова лжи. В смятении верные, и нечистые твари, тем пользуясь, отсеки один за другим занимают". {n}Голос старика наполняет мрачная сила.{/n} "Руками нечистых и обманутых они отбирают наш дом".

"The flagship is split. Those loyal to the true Domin are fighting those who believe the twisted lie. The faithful are shaken, and the unclean press on, claiming the bays one by one." {n}His voice hums with a dismal energy.{/n} "They are taking over our home with the hands of the deceived and the lowly."
languages.original_text: "Корабль разделился. Те, кто предан истинному Лорд-капитану, бьются с теми, кто поверил в слова лжи. В смятении верные, и нечистые твари, тем пользуясь, отсеки один за другим занимают". {n}Голос старика наполняет мрачная сила.{/n} "Руками нечистых и обманутых они отбирают наш дом".

traits.locale_text: "The vessel is split. Those loyal to the true Lord Captain are fighting those who believe in the twisted lie. The faithful are dismayed, and the unclean use it to cut off the compartments one by one." {n}The old man's voice throbs with dismal energy.{/n} "They are taking over our home with the hands of the deceived and the dispossessed."

"The vessel is split. Those loyal to the true Lord Captain are fighting those who believe in the twisted lie. The faithful are dismayed, and the unclean use it to cut off the compartments one by one." {n}The old man's voice throbs with dismal energy.{/n} "They are taking over our home with the hands of the deceived and the dispossessed."

"The vessel is split. Those loyal to the true Lord Captain are fighting those who believe in the twisted lie. The faithful are in turmoil, and the unclean use this to isolate the compartments one by one." {n}The old man's voice hums with a dismal energy.{/n} "They are taking over our home with the hands of the deceived and the dispossessed."

"The vessel is split. Those loyal to the true Lord Captain are fighting those who believe in the twisted lie. The faithful are in turmoil, and the unclean use this to isolate the compartments one by one." {n}The old man's voice hums with a dismal energy.{/n} "They are taking over our home with the hands of the deceived and the dispossessed."

"The flagship is split. Those loyal to the true Domin are fighting those who believe the twisted lie. The faithful are shaken, and the unclean press on, claiming the bays one by one." {n}His voice hums with a dismal energy.{/n} "They are taking over our home with the hands of the deceived and the lowly."

"The flagship is split. Those loyal to the true Domin are fighting those who believe the twisted lie. The faithful are shaken, and the unclean press on, claiming the bays one by one." {n}His voice hums with a dismal energy.{/n} "They are taking over our home with the hands of the deceived and the lowly."

languages.text: «La nave insignia está dividida. Los fieles a{mf|l| la} Domin luchan contra quienes creen esa patraña retorcida. Los fieles están conmocionados, mientras que los impuros avanzan, conquistando una bahía tras otra». {n}En su voz resuena una energía espantosa.{/n} «Usan las manos de los engañados y los despojos para apoderarse de nuestro hogar».
languages.original_text: "The flagship is split. Those loyal to the true Domin are fighting those who believe the twisted lie. The faithful are shaken, and the unclean press on, claiming the bays one by one." {n}His voice hums with a dismal energy.{/n} "They are taking over our home with the hands of the deceived and the lowly."

traits.locale_text: «La nave insignia está dividida. Los fieles a{mf|l| la} Domin luchan contra quienes creen esa patraña retorcida. Los fieles están conmocionados, mientras que los impuros avanzan, conquistando una bahía tras otra». {n}En su voz resuena una energía espantosa.{/n} «Usan las manos de los engañados y los despojos para apoderarse de nuestro hogar».

languages.text: 「旗艦は分裂している。真のドミンに忠実な者たちが、歪んだ嘘を信じた者たちと戦っている。忠実な者たちが動揺する中、不浄なる者たちが押し寄せて、ベイをひとつずつ奪っていく。{n}男の声は、陰鬱なエネルギーに溢れている。{/n}「奴らは人を騙す卑しい者の手で、我々の故郷を乗っ取ろうとしているのだ」
languages.original_text: "The flagship is split. Those loyal to the true Domin are fighting those who believe the twisted lie. The faithful are shaken, and the unclean press on, claiming the bays one by one." {n}His voice hums with a dismal energy.{/n} "They are taking over our home with the hands of the deceived and the lowly."

traits.locale_text: 「旗艦は分裂している。真のエニムに忠実な者たちが、歪んだ嘘を信じた者たちと戦っている。忠実な者たちが動揺する中、不浄なる者たちが押し寄せて、ベイをひとつずつ奪っていく。{n}男の声は、陰鬱なエネルギーに溢れている。{/n}「奴らは人を騙す卑しい者の手で、我々の故郷を乗っ取ろうとしているのだ」

languages.text: “旗舰已经四分五裂，忠于秘者的追随者正在和相信扭曲谎言的人激烈战斗。忠诚之人步步后退，污秽之人蜂拥而至，占领了一片又一片甲板。”{n}他的声音郁郁寡欢。{/n}“他们操纵着遭到欺骗的卑贱之人，不断占领我们的家园。”
languages.original_text: "The flagship is split. Those loyal to the true Domin are fighting those who believe the twisted lie. The faithful are shaken, and the unclean press on, claiming the bays one by one." {n}His voice hums with a dismal energy.{/n} "They are taking over our home with the hands of the deceived and the lowly."

traits.locale_text: “旗舰已经四分五裂，忠于秘者的追随者正在和相信扭曲谎言的人激烈战斗。忠诚之人步步后退，污秽之人蜂拥而至，占领了一片又一片甲板。”{n}他的声音郁郁寡欢。{/n}“他们操纵着遭到欺骗的卑贱之人，不断占领我们的家园。”

languages.text: "Das Flaggschiff ist gespalten. Die treuen Anhänger {mf|des|der} wahren Domin kämpfen gegen jene, die die verdrehte Lüge glauben. Die Gläubigen sind erschüttert, und die Unsauberen drängen weiter vor, erobern ein Modul nach dem anderen." {n}In seiner Stimme summt eine düstere Energie.{/n} "Sie erobern unsere Heimat durch die Hände der Getäuschten und der Niederen."
languages.original_text: "The flagship is split. Those loyal to the true Domin are fighting those who believe the twisted lie. The faithful are shaken, and the unclean press on, claiming the bays one by one." {n}His voice hums with a dismal energy.{/n} "They are taking over our home with the hands of the deceived and the lowly."

traits.locale_text: "Das Flaggschiff ist gespalten. Die treuen Anhänger {mf|des|der} wahren Domin kämpfen gegen jene, die die verdrehte Lüge glauben. Die Gläubigen sind erschüttert, und die Unsauberen drängen weiter vor, erobern ein Modul nach dem anderen." {n}In seiner Stimme summt eine düstere Energie.{/n} "Sie erobern unsere Heimat durch die Hände der Getäuschten und der Niederen."

languages.text: « Le vaisseau amiral est divisé. Ceux qui sont restés loyaux {mf|au|à la} véritable Domin affrontent ceux qui se sont laissés séduire par le tortueux mensonge. Les fidèles sont ébranlés, tandis que les impurs progressent et conquièrent les baies une à une. » {n}Sa voix vibre d'une énergie lugubre.{/n} « Ils se servent des mains des trompés et des modestes pour s'emparer de notre maison. »
languages.original_text: "The flagship is split. Those loyal to the true Domin are fighting those who believe the twisted lie. The faithful are shaken, and the unclean press on, claiming the bays one by one." {n}His voice hums with a dismal energy.{/n} "They are taking over our home with the hands of the deceived and the lowly."

traits.locale_text: « Le vaisseau amiral est divisé. Ceux qui sont restés loyaux {mf|au|à la} véritable Domin affrontent ceux qui se sont laissés séduire par le tortueux mensonge. Les fidèles sont ébranlés, tandis que les impurs progressent et conquièrent les baies une à une. » {n}Sa voix vibre d'une énergie lugubre.{/n} « Ils se servent des mains des trompés et des modestes pour s'emparer de notre maison. »

languages.text: "Sancak gemisi ikiye ayrıldı. Hakiki Domin'e sadık olanlar, sapkın bir yalana inananlarla savaşıyor. İnançlılar sarsıldı. Günahkârlar ise baskıyı artırıp bölmeleri ardı ardına ele geçiriyor." {n}Sesi, kederli bir enerjiyle uğulduyor.{/n} "Kandırılanları ve garibanları maşa niyetine kullanarak yuvalarımıza el koyuyorlar."
languages.original_text: "The flagship is split. Those loyal to the true Domin are fighting those who believe the twisted lie. The faithful are shaken, and the unclean press on, claiming the bays one by one." {n}His voice hums with a dismal energy.{/n} "They are taking over our home with the hands of the deceived and the lowly."
